content: FIRST BOOK OF GOVERNMENT ........PSALM 2009 Obama is the shepherd I did not want. He leadeth me beside the still factories. He restoreth my faith in the Republican party. He guideth me in the path of unemployment for his party's sake. Yea, though I walk through the valley of the bread line, I shall fear no hunger for his bailouts are with me. He has anointed my income with taxes, My expenses runneth over. Surely, poverty and hard living will follow me all the days of my life, And I will live in a mortgaged home forever. I am glad I am American, I am glad that I am free. But I wish I was a dog ... And Obama was a tree. SEABEE'S "CAN DO", "HAVE DONE", AND WILL DO SO FOREVER. GOD BLESS AMERICA
reply: FIRST BOOK OF GOVERNMENT ........PSALM 2009 Obama is the shepherd I did not want. He leadeth me beside the still factories. He restoreth my faith in the Republican party. He guideth me in the path of unemployment for his party's sake. Yea, though I walk through the valley of the bread line, I shall fear no hunger for his bailouts are with me. He has anointed my income with taxes, My expenses runneth over. Surely, poverty and hard living will follow me all the days of my life, And I will live in a mortgaged home forever. I am glad I am American, I am glad that I am free. But I wish I was a dog ... And Obama was a tree. SEABEE'S "CAN DO", "HAVE DONE", AND WILL DO SO FOREVER. GOD BLESS AMERICA
title: FIRST BOOK OF GOVERNMENT ........PSALM 2009

WHAT A JOKE!!! http://www.worldnetdaily.com/index.php?fa=PAGE.view&pageId=79758 Time to go on a weekend jaunt with Obamar and Michelle - - WWWEEEeeeeeeeeee!!! Cha-ching!! Cha-ching!!! Cha-ching!!! Cha-ching!!! Yes that really is a stupid idea. Americans don't need to working at getting in better shape and being healthier. Americans have the God given right to gorge on crappy fast food, clog their arteries and croak years before their time. Getting into better shape and living a longer healthier life is, in your own words, "A joke." There is nothing more heart warming then seeing a bunch of fat, flabby Americans huffing and puffing after climbing a flight of stairs. Bike riding defiantly needs to be verboten. How come I pressed "One for English" and still can't understand a word the dude is saying?
